name: SCRAP!
description:
SCRAP! is a 10-15 minute solo game where you explore a wasteland scavenging for SCRAP to sell at the next settlement. Along the way you'll fill in a small hex map, avoid Night Goblins, and be up to your neck in SCRAP!

At the end of each run, tally up the value of your SCRAP share it with others on instragram or twitter using #SCRAPSCORE.

My personal High Score is : 89

Materials Need:

  • 2 standard d6
  • 1 Pencil and Eraser
  • 1 Character Sheet
  • 20 minutes to read rules and complete first run!

I created SCRAP! as a self imposed 24hr game jam. I wanted to see if I could go from concept to "finished" in under a day. I didn't quite make the mark, go over by a few hours, but I still consider it a success. I learned a ton from this exercise!

Some omitted ideas that may be added if there is a large interest:

  • Daily mutations: Gain retools, armor, loot roll buffs, etc.
  • Collectibles/Achievements: Ways to track certain outcomes and events. Example, collecting 3 Lunar Fragments unlocks ???.
  • Wandering Trader: Offers healing services, help navigating, etc. in exchange for your SCRAP.

The cover artwork is a mixture of Public Domain works and my own drawing/embellishing on top. All artwork and writing within is my own.
